original_title: The History of Religion | 宗教の歴史
overview: The video is made up of, on the sound side, a composition consisting of 58 words, in Japanese, accompanied by piano, and, on the image side, a series of images captioned, in Japanese and English, in correspondence with the recitation on the sound side. A title has been added.  (Voice: Maya Taneda.)
title: The History of Religion
